title: [Large-Scale] Strategies to Mitigate Teacher Boredom in Blended-Based English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Over 5 years of secondary English teaching experience and basic understanding of blended learning
context.additional_context: Experience in math-integrated language education, with a digital device-enabled environment

learning_goals: Participating teachers can analyze five factors that cause boredom in blended learning environments.
Participating teachers can propose three or more blended instruction design methods to reduce repetitiveness and monotony.
Participating teachers can reduce inefficient teacher-learner communication issues by 20% through the application of creative pedagogical methods.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
